item.title: Short Circuiting Part2
item.author: Michael
item.description: Part 2 (logical AND) In JavaScript, we can utilize short-circuiting using || (logical OR) or the && (logical AND) operators. This article focuses on the logical AND (&&) operator and provides examples. Logical AND && Examples Try to guess and test them yourself true && false // OUTPUT: false (2nd value eval) false && true // OUTPUT: false (1st value eval) true && true // OUTPUT: true (2nd value eval) // other variants of the above "" && "michael" // OUTPUT: "" (1st value eval) !

item.title: Short Circuiting Part1
item.author: Michael
item.description: JS Short Circuiting to Shorten your Code - Part 1 (Logical OR) In JavaScript, we can utilize short-circuiting using || (logical OR) or the && (logical AND) operators. This article focuses on the logical OR (||) operator and provides an example of how to use it to simplify code. Logical OR || Examples Try to guess and test them yourself true || false // OUTPUT: true (1st value evaluated) false || true // OUTPUT: true (2nd value evaluated) false || false // OUTPUT: false (2nd value evaluated) // other variants of the above 3.
